0x3CC98B25.name: GET_EXTERNAL_KVP_FLOAT
0x3CC98B25.description: A getter for [SET_RESOURCE_KVP_FLOAT](#\_0x9ADD2938), but for a specified resource.

examples.code:
local kvpValue = GetExternalKvpFloat('drugs', 'mollis') 
if kvpValue then
	-- do something!
end

0x3CC98B25.resultsDescription: A float that contains the value stored in the Kvp or nil/null if none.
